HTML - Hyper Text Markup Language.
HTML vs HTML5
Head Tag: Meta Tag- information about the document.
Body Tag: Contain all of your content
Basic Tags:
Example: <h1>Hello</h1>
Element: tag + content
above one is called element.
Heading Tag:H1.....H6

- Paragraph Tag: <p>Paragraph</p>

- Break Tag: <br> - line break

- To redirect the document, we use "a tag/anchor tag".
Example:
<a href="https://github.com/Thiru-cse" target="_blank">My Github</a>
href: attribute
attribute: it gives the additional information about tag.
href: represent the link where it has to be redirect.
target: help us to open the document on new tab.

- Bold Tag: <b>GUVI</b>

- Underline Tag:  <h1><u>Reputed Edtech platform</u></h1>

- List: Ordered List , UnOrdered List.
Example:
 
UnOrdered List:
<ul>
        <li>Rajini</li>
        <li>Kamal</li>
</ul>

Ordered List:
<ol>
        <li>John</li>
        <li>Doe</li>
</ol>

- img tag:
Example:
<img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Description of image">

- Table:
tr: table row
td: table data
th: table head

Example:
   <table>
    <tr>
        <th>Day</th>
        <th>Period 1</th>
        <th>Period 2</th>
        <th>Period 3</th>
        <th>Period 4</th>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td>Day 1</td>
        <td>Maths</td>
        <td>Tamil</td>
        <td>English</td>
        <td>P.E.T</td>
    </tr>
   </table>
